owner.username: Galt Museum & Archives on The Commons

description._content: 1911 10.8 cm x 15.2 cm Black and white photograph] Photographer: Arthur Rafton-Canning, British & Colonial Photographic Co. View of downtown Lethbridge looking northwest from the top of the water standpipe at 5 Avenue and 9 Street (Stafford Drive) South, 1911. The view of this photo and that of 19891049146, taken in 1907, illustrate Rafton-Canning’s skill as a documentary photographer as he returned to the same location to take a second photograph documenting the changes in the downtown core. To obtain high quality and larger reproductions of this image please visit the Galt Museum & Archives website: www.galtmuseum.com/archives.htm and include thIs number in your request: 19891049147
